pages.text: A delicious brownish mushroom which can be found everywhere. It is the most common species of mushrooms in these lands, closely followed by the $(l:mushrooms/red_mushroom)Red Mushroom$().
This mushroom is colored light brown.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: The Brown Mushroom is edible and can be used for cooking meals.$(br2)Specially prepared with precisely dosed sweeteners and arachnid tissue, it can also be used as a basis for brewing potions.
